message.name: ERR_PROSPECTPERSONCITIZENSHIP_SEARCH_RECORDSFOUND
message.locale: The citizenship requested falls within the time period of an existing citizenship for this prospect person in this country.

message.name: ERR_PROSPECTPERSONCITIZENSHIP_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_CREATE
message.locale: New citizenship details cannot be added for a client that is currently marked as a duplicate.

message.name: ERR_PROSPECTPERSONCITIZENSHIP_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_MODIFY
message.locale: Citizenship details of a client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_PROSPECTPERSONCITIZENSHIP_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_DELETE
message.locale: Citizenship details for a client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be deleted.
